name: Planet Funk
description:
Defend your world against the invading armada. Missiles, asteroids, UFO's and orbiting drones descend on the planet in ever increasing numbers.

Your only defenses are four satellite missile batteries with limited energy, and a massive shield.

Save codes available at each new level in all but hardcore mode, and an animated help menu adds more explanation into the game's mechanics.

How long can you survive before total annihilation?

Click button in lower right corner of game for full screen (especially in mobile play).
